body: The Government of Angola announced [pt] the introduction of seven national languages in the curricula of  basic education in 2011, "to bridge the learning gap of children whose  mother tongue is not Portuguese". Meanwhile, more and more schools "which dispense references to Angola" are openning, according to BWE Angolano's blog [pt].
